Definition: Semicolon-separated list of (internal) study identifiers (cross-referencing to study worksheet) to which the file belongs.
Link to the data file (or digital object) in a public database or in a persistent institutional repository; or identifier of the data file when submitted together with the MIAPPE submission.
Description of the format of the data file. May be a standard file format name, or a description of organization of the data in a tabular file.
Example:
FASTA
tab-delimited
column headers headers: 1. A 2. B 3. C

Definition: The version of the dataset (the actual data).
